Help.Text:
FILENAME
File selection dialog box.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 The Filename button opens a file selection dialog box for selecting the workfile to edit.

EDITWORKFILE
Name of workfile to edit.
 
 Default = Last workfile created in this CFE session.
 Allowed =
 Text field for entering the name of the workfile to edit.

Help.Tip: Button to accept values and remove pop-up.
Help.Text:
OK
Button to accept values and remove pop-up.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that accepts values and removes the pop-up.

Help.Tip: Button that accepts values but does not remove the pop-up..
Help.Text:
APPLY
Button that accepts values but does not remove the pop-up..
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that accepts values but does not remove the pop-up.

Help.Tip: Button to remove the pop-up without changing values.
Help.Text:
CANCEL
Button to remove the pop-up without changing values.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
Button to remove the pop-up without changing values.

Help.Tip: Allows the user to access the pop-up Help Window.
Help.Text:
HELP
Allows the user to access the pop-up Help Window.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 The Help Window allows access to three kinds of help:  Parameter Help, CPS Process Help and Application (CFE) Help.
